#summary Quick guide to compiling, running, and using Asm816
= Introduction =

This document aims to provide step-by-step directions to compiling, running, and using Asm816 for IIgs software development.  At the moment, this document is incomplete, but I feel that some information is better than none.


= Getting the software =

The asm816 software is only available as source code.  First, you need to install Java development tools so you can compile asm816:

  * Download and install the [http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp _Java Platform JDK_]
  * Download and install [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads]_Eclipse for Java Developers_
